Utility Edition | June 17, 2014
Confidential & Proprietary
ACE14: Trade Show Recap
Badger Meter attended AWWA's Annual
Conference and Exposition in Boston, MA last week (June 8th - June 11th). With a new booth, ACE14 was our first opportunity since the DistribuTECH product launch to showcase BEACON Advanced Metering Analytics (AMA) to utility trade show attendees.
Booth attendance was high, with consistent traffic throughout the entire show. We were particularly excited about the strong turnout for BEACON AMA product demonstrations, with a number of customers visiting solely for that reason.
Other highlights included:
ACE14 Technical Session, "How Is Technology Changing the Water Utility Industry?", hosted by Badger Meter. Water Online radio interview with John Fillinger. Video interview with Kristie Anderson and AWWA (link to video coming soon). CEO Reception at the Boston Tea Party Museum, hosted by Rich Meeusen. New England Microbrews and Martinis at the Badger Meter booth (featuring the "Flowing B Stinger")!
Click Here to see the full ACE14 photo album
Thank you to all customers, partners and employees for an incredibly successful ACE14!
Please contact Judson Luke if you have any questions.
BEACON AMA Starter Kits - June Update
June has already been a busy month for BEACON AMA Starter Kit sales! Great job to everyone who tallied a sale over the past two weeks. Attendance for BEACON AMA demonstrations at ACE14 was high, so be sure to capitalize on this momentum with existing or competitive accounts!
A special congratulations to Angie Phillips, who was able to sell a BEACON AMA Starter Kit with an expanded number of ORION Cellular endpoints!
Remember, if your customer is interested in additional ORION endpoints with their BEACON AMA Starter Kit, we can work with them on a case-by-case basis to better prepare for a full BEACON AMA deployment.

George Anderson Award
Congratulations to George DeJarlais,
principal mechanical engineer at Badger Meter, winner of the prestigious George Anderson Award!
This award was established in 2004 by AWWA to recognize outstanding, long-term contributions by members, consultants and manufacturers in the field of water manufacturing.
Feel free to congratulate George DeJarlais on his award!
Updated Utility Products Price List
A Packaging Guidelines tab has been added to the latest version of the Utility Products Price List located on the Badger Meter extranet.
This new tab provides packaging information such as units per box, boxes per skid, units per skid, and can be used as a guideline for standard product configurations.
Please Contact Jan Boyer if you have any questions.
Now Available: Itron Encoder Cable with Inline Connector and Cable Armor
Encoders and E-Series Ultrasonic meters may now be ordered with 5’ lead, Itron connector and Cable Armor.
Pricing adder can be found on the encoder and E-Series Ultrasonic meter sections of the Utility Products Price List (UTL-PL-00053-EN-14) located on the Badger Meter extranet.
Please contact Sheila Nally if you have any questions.
